Comment: Nazi Germany was the least competent government in history. Just look at Der Wunderwaffe. We corner someone in the know and find out the plot was entirely for the purpose of making radioactive toothpaste for the civilian market. They weren’t bluffing or anything. I don’t think they ever even made the damn toothpaste. They still slaughtered tens of millions.
